Planner.Lawnmower module¶

Planner.Myopic3D module¶

Myopic3D path planner determines the next waypoint according to minimum EIBV criterion.

class Planner.Myopic3D.Myopic3D(wp: WaypointGraph.WaypointGraph)¶

Bases: Planner.Planner.Planner

Myopic3D planner.

get_candidates()¶

Filter sharp turn, bottom up and dive down behaviours.

It computes the dot product between two vectors. One is from the previous waypoint to the current waypoint. The other is from the current waypoint to the potential next waypoint. .. rubric:: Example

>>> wp_prev = np.array([x1, y1, z1])
>>> wp_curr = np.array([x2, y2, z2])
>>> vec1 = wp_curr - wp_prev
>>> for wp in wp_neighbours:
>>>     wp = np.array([xi, yi, zi])
>>>     vec2 = wp - wp_curr
>>>     if dot(vec1.T, vec2) >= 0:
>>>         append(wp)
Returns

filtered candidate indices in the waypointgraph. id_neighbours: all the neighbours at the current location.

Return type

id_smooth

get_next_waypoint()¶

Get next waypoint according to minimum EIBV criterion.

If no possible candiate locations were found. Then a random location in the neighbourhood is selected.

Returns

designed next waypoint location.

Return type

wp_next

Planner.Planner module¶

Planner selects candidate locations and then decide which one to go next.

param _id_prev

previous index

param _id_now

current index

param _id_next

next index

param _id_pion

pioneer index
